duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the underwriting audit team and employees, including the development and communication of guidelines, processes, and workload balancing.
Coaching and management of individual team members as needed, including daily assignment of work and management of production.
Management of audit spreadsheets, reporting, and escalation of audit findings to the Chief Underwriter.
Perform post-issue application and Milliman information reviews for applications issued via digital or straight through process platforms.
Prepare and complete rescission recommendations for review when necessary.
Document results of audit/file examinations, identifying areas of noncompliance or deficient underwriting.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 5 years of life insurance underwriting. Bachelor’s degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
